headline: The Markets Are Dropping, But These 2 Buffett Stocks Are Soaring
summary: Warren Buffett certainly knows how to pick 'em.  While the investing community reels from the impact of President Trump's tariff program, many Buffett stocks are beating the market.  Consider how Coca-Cola (NYSE: KO) stock and Kroger stock (NYSE: KR) are faring as compared with the S&P 500 this year.

headline: Kroger (NYSE:KR) Expands Plant-Based Offerings With Major TiNDLE Foods Rollout
summary: TiNDLE Foods announced a major U.S. retail expansion, launching in over 500 stores under the Kroger (NYSE: KR) Family of Stores in April. Over the last quarter, Kroger's stock price moved 13%, a performance that stood out amid a period where broader market trends were generally downward, with the S&P 500 and related indexes experiencing noticeable declines. The expansion with TiNDLE could have added weight to Kroger’s positive trajectory, alongside other strategic changes such as product...

headline: Kroger’s billion-dollar bust
summary: The Ohio-based grocery chain has spent over $1 billion on the failed Albertsons merger, and that number could more than double

headline: Kroger says its pursuit of Albertsons cost over $1B
summary: The grocer spent nearly $700 million on fees related to the failed merger attempt in 2024 alone, according to a regulatory filing.
